channel.title: temporary works on
channel.description: Recent content in temporary works on

item.title: Check categories
item.description: Check categories In temporary works, checks can come in different categories depending on the complexity, specificity or innovation of the task at hand.

item.title: Factor of safety for slopes (temporary and permanent)
item.description: Factor of safety for slopes (temporary and permanent) In N. A. Trenter’s book ‘Earthworks - A Guide (2001)’, the following factors of safety have been derived.

item.title: Pre-Augering
item.description: Pre-Augering The process of reducing the density of the ground by essentially pre-drilling the area of sheet pile installation with an auger attached.

item.title: Sheet Piling
item.description: Sheet Piling Sheet Piling is the process of driving large sheets of metal into the ground in order to provide ground support.

item.title: ðŸ”§ Temporary Works MOC
item.description: Temporary Works MOC “Temporary works can be described as providing an “engineered solution” that is used to support or protect either an existing structure or the permanent works during construction, or to support an item of plant or equipment, or the vertical sides or side-slopes of an excavation during construction operations on site or to provide access.
